blogs.title: Remote Devlopment on SSH Servers
blogs.abstract: Secure Shell servers, are used for providing secure and encrypted access to remote servers. Here we dive into the details of these servers, covering topics like creating servers, setting up environments, updating projects, and running code.
blogs.author: Sagar Prakash Barad

blogs.title: Markdown
blogs.abstract: Here we focus on the fundamentals of Git & GitHub, covering basic concepts like commits, branches, pull requests (PRs), merges, and integration with other tools used by coders, such as VS Code.
blogs.author: Aritra Mukhopadhyay

blogs.title: Why Neural Network
blogs.abstract: We want to build an intelligent system. But why neural networks? In this, we will explore the concept of universal approximation, which states that neural networks can theoretically approximate any function, given enough hidden units and a suitable activation function.
blogs.author: Shriman Keshri

blogs.title: Hello, world.
blogs.abstract: The Software Development Group at NISER has been operational since the fall of 2018, with the aim of bringing together people from different disciplines who prefer a code first approach to solving problems.
blogs.author: Ayush Singh
